items.text: full on middle stump, and driven down the ground to wide long on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asif Ali, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and pushed past cover for a jogging single
items.postText: Stat from Karthik: In 11 overs, Bangladesh's fifth bowler(s) Mahmudullah and Soumya Sarkar have conceded 35 runs.
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: overpitched on middle stump, and drilled down the ground to long on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off stump, and going straight through. Cut off the back foot to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asif Ali, 1 run

items.text: good length on leg stump, and he works this off his pads to midwicket for another walking single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off stump, and pushed off the front foot to cover point. Can't beat the infield. Required run rate now 6.5
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asif Ali, no run

items.text: good length outside off stump, and the skidder can't be cut away. Through to the keeper
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asif Ali, no run

items.text: good length outside off again, and it hurries onto the batsman. Defended back to the bowler
items.postText: Change in commentary again. Karthik's back.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asif Ali, no run

items.preText: Indeed I am. Mahmudullah to continue from round the wicket to Imam, who's been there through two changes in commentary. Whadaplaya.
items.text: full on off stump, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: short outside off, an ordinary delivery, slapped away to the right of cover point
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asif Ali, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length close to off stump, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asif Ali, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, stretches out to block back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asif Ali, no run

items.text: nicely played. Strays slightly onto leg stump and he quickly gets down on one knee to paddle to long leg
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asif Ali, 1 run

items.text: floated up full on leg stump and there's Imam's fifty, brings it up with a quietly clipped single to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.preText:
Offspin from both ends. Mehidy now, from round the wicket to Imam.

Viswa: "Just on a curious note. What do you commentators do when there is no international match?" -- Rejoice, mostly.
items.text: down the track, gets close to the pitch of the ball to drive to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: flighted and pitched right up on off stump, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asif Ali, 1 run

items.preText: Nouman Latif: "Wtih Asif in last 10 pakistan can chase anything. They just need to take it to the end as it is."
items.text: flatter now, on leg stump and pitched up. Whipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: full on off stump, driven inside-out to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: flighted delivery on off stump, driven past the diving midwicket fielder and down to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asif Ali, 1 run

items.text: back of a length. slides on with the angle to leg stump. Punched to long-on
items.postText: Vikas: "Pakistan exactly at half stage 120/5 and need 120 with 5 wickets in hand. " -- I'm not entirely sure 32 is exactly half of 50, but I'll take your word for it. Anand: "Is Mortaza okay ?? Whose overs are Mahmudullah eating up ?? Just getting through overs quickly or backup for a pacer?? " -- If you haven't heard already, Shakib Al Hasan is out injured. It's time for drinks.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.preText: Mahmudullah into his eighth over now.
items.text: flighted ball wide of off stump, driven to deep point
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, looks to pick up a driven single to long-on and succeeds, but only because the midwicket fielder fumbles the ball and lets it slip through his fingers
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asif Ali, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, punched to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: length ball, a bit of width, and that's a beautiful shot. Great hands here from Asif, and great footwork too. Goes deep in his crease to manufacture some shortness of length, and slices it away to the left of backward point
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asif Ali, FOUR runs

items.text: tossed up outside off, presses forward and pushes gently into the covers to pick up a quick single. Puts pressure on the extra-cover fielder, Sarkar, who rushes in and fails to pick up cleanly
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asif Ali, 1 run
